title: Bad fork_url provider: RelativeUrlWithoutBase
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [ ] Foundry
- [ ] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (3c49efe 2022-07-14T00:05:10.018576Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

yarn deploy (scaffold-eth2)

### Operating System

macOS (Intel)

### Describe the bug

[⠊] Compiling...
No files changed, compilation skipped
The application panicked (crashed).
Message:  Bad fork_url provider: RelativeUrlWithoutBase
Location: /Users/runner/work/foundry/foundry/utils/src/lib.rs:927

This is a bug. Consider reporting it at https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry
